content.rendered:
[et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” background_color=”#09131E” use_background_color_gradient=”on” background_color_gradient_stops=”rgba(9,19,30,0.85) 0%|rgba(9,19,30,0.85) 100%” background_color_gradient_overlays_image=”on” background_color_gradient_start=”rgba(9,19,30,0.85)” background_color_gradient_end=”rgba(9,19,30,0.85)” background_image=”https://rosengroup.ca/wp-content/uploads/2022/03/wealthy-families-header-bg.jpg” custom_padding=”120px||120px||false|false” custom_css_main_element=”background-position: 50% 40%;” locked=”off” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.27.4″ _module_preset=”default” text_orientation=”center” custom_margin=”||8px||false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Successful Families & Individuals

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.27.4″ _module_preset=”default” text_orientation=”center” background_layout=”dark” max_width=”750px” max_width_tablet=”500px” max_width_phone=”” max_width_last_edited=”on|tablet” module_alignment=”center” module_alignment_tablet=”center” module_alignment_phone=”” module_alignment_last_edited=”on|desktop” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Growing Wealth for Successful Families & Individuals

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” locked=”off” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_2,1_2″ _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” locked=”off” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”45bda54e-96c3-41cf-a663-5af8a7714565″ header_2_font_size=”32px” max_width=”510px” locked=”off” global_colors_info=”{}”]

No matter your goals, lifestyle or risk tolerance, we have a wealth solution for you.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_divider divider_weight=”2px” _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” width=”200px” custom_margin=”30px||||false|false” locked=”off” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_divider][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.27.4″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Being a High-Net-Worth Family or Individual provides special opportunities for wealth growth and management. The exclusive advantages are simple: you have more money at your disposal to invest and save. But along with this advantage comes complexity.

At Rosen Group Private Wealth Management we understand that your time should be spent enjoying your lifestyle, not spent deciphering strategies to meet your unique financial situation. We act as the trusted CFO to wealthy families, with a dedicated team of professionals who oversee our clients’ financial portfolios.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_image src=”https://rosengroup.ca/wp-content/uploads/2022/02/your-family_wealth-management_new.jpg” title_text=”your-family-graph_new” show_in_lightbox=”on” _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” max_width=”450px” module_alignment=”center” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” custom_margin=”20px||||false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.27.4″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”]

In 2020, North America led the world’s High-Net-Worth Individual or Family wealth with $24.3 trillion. As a High-Net-Worth client you deserve a comprehensive financial management solution that meets your specific, complex and evolving requirements and expectations. Preserving wealth, minimizing taxes and simplifying the process for heirs are primary concerns for the High-Net-Worth Family or Individual. Rosen Group Private Wealth Management has the innovative, strategic and exclusive holistic advice that our clients can rely on to grow and protect their wealth, and thus preserve their legacy for their children, and grandchildren.

We invite you to come in and meet our team. We’ll start by getting to know each other and answer all the questions you have about our services and your current financial situation. We specialize in helping our clients build a lifelong financial road map designed to help them create the life they want today, tomorrow and for whatever adventure comes next. Whatever your next looks like, our financial team will help you get there via a wealth management portfolio crafted with clarity and precision.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” custom_margin=”60px||||false|false” locked=”off” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” background_color=”#F7F7F7″ custom_padding=”30px|3%|30px|3%|false|true” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”93345947-f191-46db-8752-0103e26d6920″ text_orientation=”center” global_colors_info=”{}”]

We will coordinate and manage all of your family’s business affairs under one roof. Incorporate the family’s assets and other concerns into one centralized location.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_button button_url=”@ET-DC@eyJkeW5hbWljIjp0cnVlLCJjb250ZW50IjoicG9zdF9saW5rX3VybF9wYWdlIiwic2V0dGluZ3MiOnsicG9zdF9pZCI6IjM4OCJ9fQ==@” button_text=”Work With Us” button_alignment=”center” _builder_version=”4.16″ _dynamic_attributes=”button_url” _module_preset=”default” custom_margin=”30px||||false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_button][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ disabled_on=”on|on|on” _builder_version=”4.27.4″ _module_preset=”3ed5c77d-34ab-4102-86b0-2f9c834481af” disabled=”on” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.27.4″ _module_preset=”default” width=”100%” width_tablet=”100%” width_phone=”100%” max_width=”100%” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.27.4″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][dsm_card_carousel slide_to_show_tablet=”2″ slide_to_show_phone=”1″ slide_to_show_last_edited=”on|phone” _builder_version=”4.27.4″ _module_preset=”c3e5cc2b-9508-4b8b-b9c4-b78b40f59978″ global_colors_info=”{}”][dsm_card_carousel_child title=”Patrick M.” subtitle=”Vice President, Mining Operation” button_url_new_window=”1″ _builder_version=”4.27.4″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}” parent_button=”off” parent_header_level=”h4″]

My transfer of assets to Rosen Group Private Wealth Management is like a jump from the juniors to the major league. Nothing like enjoying life knowing that my assets are managed “turn key” by a group of professionals in every possible win-win situation to maximize my portfolio.

[/dsm_card_carousel_child][dsm_card_carousel_child title=”Rio V. Libero” subtitle=”Retired Industrial Engineer” button_url_new_window=”1″ _builder_version=”4.27.4″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}” parent_button=”off” parent_header_level=”h4″]

I’ve been working with the Rosen Group for several years, and I appreciate the team’s expertise and professionalism. Christine, Lewis, and Thanh have been attentive to my needs, providing tailored advice to help me navigate my retirement planning. Recently, Andrew offered valuable guidance on my RRSP withdrawal strategy, which has given me more clarity and confidence in my financial future. I look forward to continuing our work together.

[/dsm_card_carousel_child][dsm_card_carousel_child title=”Lynn Langevin” subtitle=”President, Lantric Technologies” button_url_new_window=”1″ _builder_version=”4.27.4″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}” parent_button=”off” parent_header_level=”h4″]

Outstanding individualized wealth management and planning team. Great work.

[/dsm_card_carousel_child][dsm_card_carousel_child title=”Howard Lang” subtitle=”I.T. Manager” button_url_new_window=”1″ _builder_version=”4.27.4″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}” parent_button=”off” parent_header_level=”h4″]

Incredibly knowledgeable team. From investments to estate planning, their expertise is unparalleled. I feel confident knowing I’m in such capable hands.

[/dsm_card_carousel_child][dsm_card_carousel_child title=”Alanna Stepto” subtitle=”HR Professional” button_url_new_window=”1″ _builder_version=”4.27.4″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}” parent_button=”off” parent_header_level=”h4″]

I have been working with Rosen Group for many years, and from day one, I was treated like more than just a number. They truly take the time to understand my financial goals and provide personalized advice that feels tailored to my unique needs. Beyond the professionalism and financial guidance, they offer an exclusive and trusted relationship that I rely on. I highly recommend their services to anyone looking for a financial advisor who values trust and personal connection.

[/dsm_card_carousel_child][dsm_card_carousel_child title=”Jimmy Kokkaliaris” subtitle=”Retired Manager” button_url_new_window=”1″ _builder_version=”4.27.4″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}” parent_button=”off” parent_header_level=”h4″]

I had been involved with another wealth management firm before making the decision to join Rosen Wealth Management after some hefty research. Not only did they understand what I wanted to achieve, but they guided me along the path of success with utmost respect and professionalism. I highly recommend this firm for a solid return on anyone’s investment.

[/dsm_card_carousel_child][dsm_card_carousel_child title=”Bev and Joe Grushka” subtitle=”Retired Teacher and Retired C.P.A.” button_url_new_window=”1″ _builder_version=”4.27.4″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}” parent_button=”off” parent_header_level=”h4″]

A comforting hand during turbulent times, the Rosen Group makes each client feel like family while providing expert advice and guidance with an objective to maximize returns with acceptable risk boundaries.

[/dsm_card_carousel_child][dsm_card_carousel_child title=”Frank B.” subtitle=”Retired Principal” button_url_new_window=”1″ _builder_version=”4.27.4″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}” parent_button=”off” parent_header_level=”h4″]

We have been with our Investment Advisor Lewis Rosen for over a decade. We are extremely pleased with Mr. Rosen’s services. He meets with us regularly to review our financial status and if warranted, advises investment changes for the benefit of increasing our portfolio. Mr. Rosen is readily available to listen and act upon whatever concerns we may have. We have done well and continue to do so under his well-informed investment knowledge and guidance. We endorse without question, the honest and professional manner in which he conducts himself, for the benefit of each of his clients.

[/dsm_card_carousel_child][/dsm_card_carousel][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.10.8″ _module_preset=”default” background_color=”#09131E” background_image=”https://rosengroup.ca/wp-content/uploads/2022/03/cta-footer-background-paralax_2.jpg” parallax=”on” custom_padding=”120px||120px||false|false” global_module=”868″ saved_tabs=”all” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row make_equal=”on” module_class=”align-center” _builder_version=”4.27.4″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][dsm_typing_effect before_typing_effect=”Invest in ” typing_effect=”yourself.|your future.” typing_speed=”50ms” typing_backdelay=”3000ms” typing_cursor=”| ” _builder_version=”4.27.4″ _module_preset=”default” header_level=”h2″ header_text_align=”center” header_text_color=”#FFFFFF” header_font_size=”60px” custom_margin=”||0px||false|false” hover_enabled=”0″ header_text_align_tablet=”center” header_text_align_phone=”” header_text_align_last_edited=”on|tablet” header_font_size_tablet=”48px” header_font_size_phone=”36px” header_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” global_colors_info=”{}” sticky_enabled=”0″][/dsm_typing_effect][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section]
